channel.title: HTML Codes To Help You Build Your Site!
channel.description:
[b]Purpose:[/b]To Help You Build Your Website [b]Difficulty:[/b]2/10 [b]Assumed Knowledge:[/b]Basic HTML, and How To Copy and Paste [b]Background:[/b] [code] [/code] Changes the background to the picture you want it to be [b]Text Color:[/b] [code]Text Here [/code] Changes the color of text [b]Text Fonts:[/b] [code]

Text here it is font garamond if your computer does not have garamond it will show up as georgia it is color orangebold text [/code] changes the text fonts [b]Image Links:[/b] [code] [/code] makes a picture link to a website of your choice [b]Image:[/b] [code] [/code] makes an image show up on your website [b]Colors:[/b] [code]Black #000000 Silver #c0c0c0 Gray #808080 White #ffffff Maroon #800000 Red #ff0000 Purple #800080 Pink #ff00ff Green #008000 Lime #00ff00 Yellow #ffff00 Blue #0000ff [/code] these are the color codes for changing color o fwebsites that use HTML [b]Text Box/Scroll Box:[/b] [code]


[/code] makes a text area with room for any amount of text [b]Credits:[/b]0.0001% Fallen 99.99999% Whoever invented HTML

item.title: HTML Codes To Help You Build Your Site!
item.dc:creator: @Red_Phat Red Phat
item.description:
@Red_Phat wrote:

[quote=“VB7 Rocks, post:2, topic:214850”][quote author=The Almost link=topic=282531.msg2293864#msg2293864 date=1214294526]
Credits:10% Fallen 90% Whoever invented HTML
[/quote]

Actually whoever invented HTML probably wouldn’t want to even be mentioned in this monstrosity.

You didn’t even explain what any of this is. How is anyone supposed to learn? Honestly, you may as well have linked to google saying “all of your HTML tutorials” and left it at that.[/quote]

You have to be so detailed. God.
He explained it very well. If he tells you it’s a text box, it damn well shows you a text box from my professional ability to copy and paste into Notepad, save it, and open it.

People are supposed to learn by studying it. And if he gets help from others, it is possible to make a pretty good website.

Please shut up. YOU, sir, waste my time.

Read full topic

item.title: HTML Codes To Help You Build Your Site!
item.dc:creator: @The_Almost The Almost
item.description:
@The_Almost wrote:

Purpose:To Help You Build Your Website
Difficulty:2/10
Assumed Knowledge:Basic HTML, and How To Copy and Paste

Background:

<body background="BackgroundURLhere">

Changes the background to the picture you want it to be
Text Color:

<span style="color:black">Text Here</span>

Changes the color of text
Text Fonts:

<p style="font: 14pt/20pt Garamond, Georgia, serif;color:#ff9900;">Text here it is font garamond if your computer does not have garamond it will show up as georgia it is color orange<span style="font-weight:bold;">bold text</span>

changes the text fonts
Image Links:

<a href="The url you want your link to take you to" target="_blank"> <img src="The url of the picture" alt="what it says when you put your mouse over the picture" /> </a>

makes a picture link to a website of your choice
Image:

<img src="ImageURL" alt="What it says when you put your cursor over the picture" />

makes an image show up on your website
Colors:

Black #000000 Silver #c0c0c0 Gray #808080 White #ffffff Maroon #800000 Red #ff0000 Purple #800080 Pink #ff00ff Green #008000 Lime #00ff00 Yellow #ffff00 Blue #0000ff
these are the color codes for changing color o fwebsites that use HTML
Text Box/Scroll Box:

[code]
Text Here

[/code] makes a text area with room for any amount of text [b]Credits:[/b]0.0001% Fallen 99.99999% Whoever invented HTML

Read full topic
